text: Rupiah Bwezani Banda (19 February 1937 - 11 March 2022) was a Zambian politician. Banda was the President of Zambia. He served as president from 2008 to 2011."Zambian VP takes charge", Reuters (International Herald Tribune), August 20, 2008. Banda died of colon cancer on 11 March 2022 in Lusaka, Zambia almost one month after his 85th birthday.Zambia's former president Rupiah Banda dies aged 85 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Presidents of Zambia Category:Vice-presidents of Zambia Category:Lund University alumni
title: Rupiah Banda
